addr: Wilton Place London, London SW1X 8SH GB
title: 16th Christmas Carol Concert 2015
desc: Great Ormond Street Hospital Children's Charity and the Christmas Carol Concert committee are delighted to invite you to our 16th Christmas Carol Concert. Begin the festive season with a captivating celebration of Christmas at our 16th Christmas Carol Concert, held at one of the most beautiful and highly decorated Victorian churches in London, St Paul?s Church, Knightsbridge. A delightful evening for all the family, beginning with a magical concert filled with Christmas carols,?delightful readings from celebrity speakers and stunning musical performances from the talented Thomas?s London School Choir, the London Central Fellowship Band and the Band of the Irish Guards. A luxurious champagne and canap? reception will follow within the beautiful ballroom of The Berkeley hotel. Children will also be treated to a fun-filled reception including special canap?s, professional entertainment and exciting Christmas activities. For more information on the event, or for advertising and sponsorship opportunities, please call 020 7239 3103 or email carol.concert@gosh.org ? Please note that Great Ormond Street Hospital Children's Charity is using a company called Eventbrite for this event and they will be processing your data to provide the required tickets. As this is an external ticket platform please ensure that you read and are satisfied with their privacy policy? www.eventbrite.co.uk/privacypolicy/
